full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LHA MO DBYANGS CAN GYI BSTOD PA, STON ZLA RAB RGYAS KU MUD DUNG DAR CHU SHEL GANGS RI LTAR DKAR BA, RAB DKAR DKAR GSAL GZI LDAN YID 'PHROG LHA MO DBYANGS CAN LA PHYAG 'TSAL LO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(RGYA GAR GYI YUL LHO PHYOGS KYI RGYUD DU BYUNG SNYAN NGAG MKHAN PO PAndI TA NAG SO'I KHOL @005B GYIS DBYANGS CAN MA'I ZHAL GZIGS PA'I DUS SU MDZAD PA'I BSTOD PA 'DI 'DON NA DBYANGS CAN MAS SHES RAB STZOL BAR KHAS BLANGS BA'I LO RGYUS YOD PAS @006A *, ,BYIN RLABS CAN YIN PAR BSAM 'DIR BRIS PA'O, ,)
